description: Removal of existing photovoltaic panels on the southern facade; installation of 31 photovoltaic panels at roof level (student accommodation)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-0900 P01 (SITE LOCATION PLAN); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-0901 P01 (EXISTING SITE PLAN); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-0500 P01 (EXISTING ELEVATIONS); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-0501 P01 (EXISTING ELEVATIONS); LCA-EWA-ZZ-RF-D-A-0409 P02 (EXISTING ROOF PLAN); LCA-EWA-ZZ-RF-D-A-1409 P03 (PROPOSED ROOF PLAN); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-1500 P01 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-1501 P01 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-1501  P01 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS 2); LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-D-A-1590 P01 (PROPOSED DEMOLITION ELEVATIONS); COVER LETTER DATED 20/02/2024; LCA-EWA-ZZ-ZZ-T-A-9001 (DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT); BB7 - 1 275BB - EWS1 ASSESSMENT REPORT - ISSUE 01
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and the Ealing Local Plan 2024 (Reg 19). | The proposed solar panels hereby approved shall provide no less than 10.7 kWp, unless an alternative energy strategy is agreed in writing with the local planning authority.

Reason: In the interests of sustainable development and combating climate change in accordance with policies SI 1, SI 2 and SI 3 of the London Plan (2021) and policies EU4, EU9, EU10 of the OPDC Local Plan (2022) .
